definition: If I remember correctly, if my memory does not fail me

phrase: que a lo largo del tiempo
El amor es ciego, pero los vecinos no
definition: "Love is blind but the neighbors are not"
"All talk and no action (much noise and little nuts)"
"A full belly and a happy heart."

phrase: Camarón que se duerme, se lo lleva la corriente
En tierra de ciegas, el tuerto es key

definition: "Where there is smoke there is fire"

phrase: En boca cerrada en entran moscas
Consejos vendo y para mi no tengo
definition: "Do as I say not as I do"

phrase: Soldado avisado no muere en guerra
definition: "Forewarned is forearmed (A soldier warned will not die in war)"
